title: Al Qaida, Houthi Rebels Push Yemen Toward Sectarian Conflict
teaser: Audie Cornish talks to journalist Iona Craig about the Houthi rebels' attack and takeover of the Yemeni presidential palace in Sanaa. Craig has been based in Yemen for the past four years.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
